tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE driving_history (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    driver_id INT,
    trip_start TIMESTAMP,
    trip_end TIMESTAMP,
    distance_traveled DECIMAL(10, 2),
    speeding_violations INT
);

CREATE TABLE driver_metrics (
  driver_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  driver_name VARCHAR(255),
  total_distance FLOAT,
  total_trips INT,
  average_speed FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE safety_metrics (
  driver_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  driver_name VARCHAR(255),
  total_accidents INT,
  total_violations INT,
  safety_rating FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE trip_data (
  trip_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  driver_id INT,
  trip_distance FLOAT,
  trip_duration FLOAT,
  start_location VARCHAR(255),
  end_location VARCHAR(255)
);
CREATE TABLE driver_info (driver_id INT PRIMARY KEY, driver_name TEXT, driver_license TEXT, address TEXT, phone_number TEXT)
CREATE TABLE trip_info (trip_id INT PRIMARY KEY, driver_id INT, start_location TEXT, end_location TEXT, trip_date DATE, trip_distance DECIMAL)
CREATE TABLE driving_behavior (behavior_id INT PRIMARY KEY, driver_id INT, speeding BOOLEAN, reckless_driving BOOLEAN, seatbelt_usage BOOLEAN, distracted_driving BOOLEAN)
CREATE TABLE driver_safety_scores (score_id INT PRIMARY KEY, driver_id INT, trip_id INT, safety_rating DECIMAL, violation_count INT)
CREATE TABLE vehicle_info (vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY, driver_id INT, make TEXT, model TEXT, year INT)
